column4: it's funny that Solaris 10 boots and installs fine, except there are no solaris drivers for the onboard ethernet controller
5.04 installed without a hitch on my laptop, but 5.10 is reminding me of one of the reasons why I ditched debian years ago
and the logs are not in /target/*
there is nothing in /target/var/log here (fresh install) - they are in /var/log
not just yours. The instructions in the installer also point to /target/...
Mwahaha. I think they mean target computer
that ought to teach you to go pushing random buttons, ESPECIALLY the "back" one
amateur psychoanalysis says that maybe there are some changes in your life that you wish to roll back
